forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 7C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High around 45F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low around 5C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 7C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 46F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady light rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. Low 3C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain tapering to a few showers late. Low 39F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low near 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High around 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 48F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 7C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 46F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 3C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 44F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.
